title: The Healthy Entertainment for Teenagers - Fosjoas Intelligent Electric Unicycles
text: The Healthy Entertainment for Teenagers - Fosjoas Intelligent Electric Unicycles At present, many teenagers have absorbed in playing computer games and watching TV shows. Actually these activities do more harm than good to the development of teenagers. China, 30 September 2015 -- At present, many teenagers have absorbed in playing computer games and watching TV shows. Actually these activities do more harm than good to the development of teenagers. Fosjoas single-wheeled electric scooters are the first intelligent vehicles which rolled out by Moben Global Inc. Although Fosjoas electric unicycles look very simple, they bring together the essence of top industrial designers all over the world. For teenagers, they are not only vehicles, but also a healthy way of entertainment. Riding Fosjoas unicycles is both beneficial for teenagers’ physical and mental health. In fact, it requires the excellent balance to ride Fosjoas electric unicycles. Although the smart chips inside the unicycles have realized self-balancing, teenagers have to maintain their balance on Fosjoas intelligent unicycles while cycling. If teenagers can ride the one-wheeled scooter very well, their physical dexterity and athletic ability will be improved a lot. At the same time, riding Fosjoas electric unicycles is good for coordinating body nerve and muscle systems, and exercising response ability. This kind of new exercise can promote the teenagers’ development of cerebellum. As a result, some education experts say that riding Fosjoas self-balancing unicycles may improve both teenagers’ physical health and intelligence. In addition, while teenagers are practicing riding Fosjoas one-wheeled scooters , they have to focus on it because of scooters’ special structure. Once they don’t give their mind to cycling, they may probably fall down from the scooter. After long-time riding, teenagers learn to concentrate on what they’re doing. This will improve their learning efficiency.All in all, it is a healthy entertainment for teenagers to riding Fosjoas self-balancing unicycles. Why not have a try? Fosjoas unicycles will benefit both teenagers’ physical and mental health. # # #
